00011 #include "itpp/itmex.h"
00012 #include "SISO.h"

00014 using namespace itpp;
00015 
00016 void mexFunction(int n_output, mxArray *output[], int n_input, const mxArray *input[])
00017 {
00018     // Check the number of inputs and output arguments
00019     if(n_output!=2) mexErrMsgTxt("Two output required!");
00020     if(n_input!=6) mexErrMsgTxt("Six inputs required!");
00021     
00022     // Convert input variables to IT++ format
00023     vec intrinsic_coded = mxArray2vec(input[0]);
00024     vec apriori_data = mxArray2vec(input[1]);
00025     bmat bin_gen = mxArray2bmat(input[2]);
00026     int win_len = mxArray2int(input[3]);
00027     bool hard_output_flag = (mxArray2double(input[4])==1.0);
00028     std::string map_metric = mxArray2string(input[5]);
00029     
00030     // ------------------ Start of routine ---------------------------
00031     tr::SISO siso; 
00032     siso.set_generators(bin_gen);
00033     siso.set_viterbi_win_len(win_len);
00034     siso.set_viterbi_hard_output_flag(hard_output_flag);
00035     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00036     vec extrinsic_data;
00037     vec extrinsic_coded;
00038     siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00039     // ------------------ End of routine -----------------------------
00040     
00041     // Convert the IT++ format to Matlab format for output
00042     output[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_coded.length(), mxREAL);
00043     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_coded, output[0]);
00044     output[1] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_data.length(), mxREAL);
00045     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_data, output[1]);
00046 }
